archimate:Folder.name: Product Lifecycle Management
archimate:Folder.documentation:
Brief Description Manage the lifecycle of a product and pricing associated with a product. Extended Description Product Lifecycle Management manages the lifecycle of a product and pricing associated with a product.
It creates a product, specifies the involvement one or more parties have with it, updates information about the product, and removes the product when it is no longer of interest to an enterprise and/or the primary party responsible for the product. A product may be created when a party is browsing an enterprise's catalog, when configuring a product, or when purchasing a product offering. Note that a purchase may be made from another enterprise.
The lifecycle of a product also includes prices associated with it which are also managed by this process.
